Name: A Walk With Yiayia
About the game: A Walk with Yiayia is a short adventure game/visual novel about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk around the neighborhood after she's lost her confidence from having a scary fall. Please wishlist our game! Wishlists are the best way you can support the game before buying it. Connect with Yiayia through engaging conversations, explore a beautiful , relaxing environments, and complete microquests throughout the neighborhood in this thoughtful, bite-sized adventure. No fail states, low stress, and an emotional story connecting the experiences between first generation immigrants and their family members, reflecting on what they can learn from each other's experiences. A Walk With Yiayia is an emotional story about inspiring your grandma to get out of her comfort zone and live her life without fear.       Add A Walk With Yiayia to your Steam Wishlist to get notified upon release!
